mapper.select: SELECT id,cast(familyId as CHAR(32)) familyId,cast(msgType as CHAR(32)) as type, cast(userId as CHAR(32)) as userId,CONCAT(#{imgPath},imgUrl) as imgUrl,content as msg,nick,createTime as time FROM imGlobal where msgType=#{msgType} and familyId=#{familyId} and id<${id} order by id desc limit 30
